dr.evomodel.antigenic
Class DirichletProcessGibbsOperator

java.lang.Object
  dr.inference.operators.SimpleMCMCOperator
      dr.evomodel.antigenic.DirichletProcessGibbsOperator
All Implemented Interfaces:
GibbsOperator, MCMCOperator
public class DirichletProcessGibbsOperator
extends SimpleMCMCOperator
implements GibbsOperator

A Gibbs operator for allocation of items to clusters under a Dirichlet process.

Version:
$Id: DirichletProcessGibbsOperator.java,v 1.16 2005/06/14 10:40:34 rambaut Exp $
Author:
Andrew Rambaut, Marc Suchard
